context_meta.author: ipostwhaticareabout
context_meta.title: 'F1 2018': Release Date For PS4, Xbox One And PC Revealed
context_meta.summary: Codemasters' popular F1 racing series will make its annual release this summer. Per a press release, F1 2018 will release worldwide on August 24 for PS4, Xbox One, and Windows. The release of the newest version of the game was strategically aligned with the 2018 Formula 1 Belgian Grand Prix at the iconic Spa-Francorchamps Circuit. Last year's game was well received by critics. It earned an 86 Metacritic score. It has historically been one of the highest-rated racing titles available on the current and last generation of consoles. As more information on the new release is made available, I'll have updates on features and pre-order details.

context_meta.author: ipostwhaticareabout
context_meta.title: This crazy new game looks like 'Grand Theft Auto' meets 'Mad Max'
context_meta.summary: "Rage 2" is essentially a superhero game when it comes to combat. You play as "Walker, the last Ranger of Vineland" — a man who carries a particular type of blood that gifts him with special powers. The long and short is "Rage 2" is a game where you'll both leap into the sky and run around blasting shotguns. The idea is that you chain together your special abilities with your arsenal, a la 2016's "DOOM" — fitting, given that "Rage 2" is a co-production of id Software and Avalanche Studios. The former is responsible for "DOOM." context_meta.author: DeltaBravo
context_meta.title: 'Fortnite' Servers Going Down Tomorrow As Epic Delays v4.2 Update
context_meta.summary: Fortnite servers will be down tomorrow, May 16th, while Epic releases the game's latest content update. The game's servers were supposed to go down for maintenance this morning, but for reasons we don't fully understand yet, the game's v4.2 patch has been delayed until tomorrow while Epic Games fixes some problems with the release. Barring some other disaster or misfortune, everything should be up and running by the time you wake up tomorrow morning. As usual, downtime will begin around 4 am EST / 1 am PST and will last for just a couple of hours. Sorry night owls, you'll have to play PUBG instead. While many challenges are still live, not all will be available until the update goes live. That

context_meta.author: DeltaBravo
context_meta.title: Thoreau's 'Walden' gets new life as a video game
context_meta.summary: PROVIDENCE, R.I. (AP) — Live in each season as it passes; breathe the air, drink the drink, taste the fruit, and resign yourself to the influence of the earth — err, game. Henry David Thoreau wrote those words — most of them — in his seminal book, “Walden.” They make up the objective of a video game that seeks to translate his exploits in the woods of Concord, Massachusetts, into a playable digital reality. “Walden, a Game” is adapted from the book and launches Tuesday on PlayStation 4. It has been available on computers for almost a year. “Obviously it's an odd or unique idea for a game,” said Tracy Fullerton, who conceived the idea and led the team that created it at the University of Southern

context_meta.summary: Last year, a friend recommended that I spend some quality time with Minecraft to get my mind off of the constant Trump news cycle and onto something marginally more productive. As a lifelong gamer, I gave it a shot - and was completely underwhelmed by the complicated controls that maneuvered my avatar across the screen on my iPhone and laptop.

context_meta.title: Hentai Game Portal Nutaku Expands Into Virtual Reality
context_meta.summary: With nearly every new technology, there is an adult component first. Online porn, for example, was one of the Internet's first applications, and remains one of its most popular. Now it's the driving force behind some of the earliest interactive games that harness virtual reality (VR) technology. Nutaku, a portal for playing 18+ games with sexy animated characters, also called hentai games, announced its expansion into VR last week with two titles that run on compatible PCs with Oculus Rift and HTC Vive support.  See also: The two titles, SexBot: Quality Assurance Simulator and Elven Love: Naughty Rituals, include VR capabilities to immerse players in each game. context_meta.title: This Week's 'Fortnite' v4.2 Update Delayed With Downtime Still To Come
context_meta.summary: Fortnite's weekly patch, ushering in Season 4's third week, has been delayed. While some of the game's challenges are live, not everything will be available until the v4.2 patch is out. That means that there's still more downtime to come. Whether that happens today or whether Epic pushes back the update to this evening remains to be seen. For now, at least, we're effectively in the grey zone between Week 2 and Week 3. Other updates, like new weapons and map changes as well as changes to 'Save The World' will also be delayed until the update goes live. context_meta.summary: Rage 2 gameplay trailer: Welcome back to the Apocalypse Following the announcement video released yesterday, Bethesda Softworks has revealed the full gameplay trailer for Rage 2. Watch the Rage 2 gameplay trailer using the player below! In Rage 2, you'll dive headfirst into a dystopian world devoid of society, law, and order. You can go anywhere, shoot anything, and explode everything. The game brings together two studio powerhouses – Avalanche Studios, masters of open world mayhem and id Software, gods of the first-person shooter – to deliver a carnival of carnage. context_meta.title: Retro Studios might be developing a Star Fox racing spinoff
context_meta.summary: According to leaks, Retro Studios, the developer behind the Metroid Prime trilogy and two Donkey Kong platformers, is working on a Star Fox racing spinoff. The rumored game is a cross between Diddy Kong Racing and F-Zero.

context_meta.title: Can’t get enough of ‘Doom’? A.I. can generate an infinite number of new levels
context_meta.summary: Researchers from Italy have developed an artificial neural network that’s capable of generating a theoretically infinite number of new levels of the classic 1993 first-person-shooter 'Doom'.

context_meta.author: DeltaBravo
context_meta.title: Headset maker's stock up 700% on 'Fortnite' mania
context_meta.summary: The "Fortnite" and "PlayerUnknown's Battlegrounds" games are all the rage, giving a monstrous boost to a company that makes gaming accessories. Turtle Beach, which sells headphones specifically designed for gamers under the Stealth, Elite Pro and Recon brands, said last week that quarterly sales surged 185%. Turtle Beach also raised its revenue and profit outlook for the year. Shares of Turtle Beach (HEAR), which trades under the cutesy ticker symbol of HEAR, have more than doubled in the past five days and are now up a whopping 766% this year. They were down about 2% Monday though after last week's impressive run. "Fortnite" and "PlayerUnknowns's Battlegrounds" are so-called battle royale games,

context_meta.author: rocky.j.mountain
context_meta.title: 2,800 NES customers affected by power outage around Centennial Park
context_meta.summary: NASHVILLE, TN (WSMV) - Approximately 2,800 NES customers are without power right now around Centennial Park in west Nashville. NES says crews have responded to the scene and are working to restore power. It's not clear what is causing the power outage. Stay with News4 for updates on this developing story.

context_meta.title: Legendary Bullpup Burst Fire Assault Rifle Leaked In 'Fortnite: Battle Royale'
context_meta.summary: Fortnite continues to add and subtract weapons from the game, and this time, some coveted new guns are probably being added, according to a recent leak. The info comes from Fortnite Tracker, which pulls data files from the game and turns them into potential leaks to share. This time, they’ve discovered a new pair of assault rifles, the “Bullpup Burst,” which would fill out the family tree of the existing grey, green and blue burst fire assault rifles.

context_meta.author: DeltaBravo
context_meta.title: The Companies Making The Most From Video Games [Infographic]
context_meta.summary: Tencent is the public company with the highest video game revenue according to research conducted by market intelligence firm Newzoo. Excluding hardware, the Chinese giant raked in just over $18 billion from its gaming business in 2017, far ahead of second-placed Sony ($10.5 billion) and third-placed Apple ($8.0 billion). Tencent has been ramping up its investment in gaming companies in recent years and notable examples include stakes in Riot Games (2011), Epic Games (2012), CK Games (2015) and Robot Entertainment (2015). Tencent took a major step in boosting its gaming revenue even further when it unveiled WeGame in April 2017, its own flagship gaming portal which hosts games and content as

context_meta.author: third_watch
context_meta.title: Almost Four Years Later, 'Destiny 2' Has Quietly Revealed The Identity Of The Exo Stranger
context_meta.summary: Destiny fans were not amused when during an interview with D2 game director Luke Smith, he spoke candidly about a few story topics. One, he admitted that the writers didn't really have any real idea what “The Darkness” was when the game launched, and the term has been written out of the game since. Secondly, he said that the most mysterious character of the vanilla game, the Exo Stranger, had her arc wrapped up “effectively” and would be gone forever. “We have a bunch of characters who are interesting, but the Exo Stranger is one that always makes me chuckle a little bit,” Luke Smith. “Because I feel that's one character where we actually wrapped up the arc. context_meta.author: nanook
context_meta.title: 'Bloodstained: Curse of the Moon' Goes All 8-Bit And Is Released At The End Of May
context_meta.summary: One of the stretch goals for the original Bloodstained: Ritual of the Night was an 8-bit game and it seems that Curse of the Moon intends to fulfill that requirement once it is released at the end of May. If you are a fan of the 8-bit era of Castlevania games, then Curse of the Moon looks exactly like the kind of game you might enjoy. With four playable characters, that of Miriam, Zangetsu, Alfred, and Gebel, it seems that the gameplay will be nicely varied as a result (shown below). If you remember, I actually interviewed Koji Igarashi back in March, where he talked about his work on Bloodstained as well as his love for the classic isekai mecha anime Aura Battler Dunbine. context_meta.author: ipostwhaticareabout
context_meta.title: After books and vinyl, board games make a comeback
context_meta.summary: Forget Candy Crush, Fifa and Call of Duty – millennials are putting down their Xbox controllers and smartphones and picking up their dice as they embrace games their parents and grandparents used to love. More and more people are exchanging marathon gaming sessions alone in a darkened room for the social fun of board games. With bars and cafes such as Thirsty Meeples in Oxford, and Draughts in London having a library of more than 800 games catering for the “cocktails and Cluedo” set, board games – as with colouring books – are no longer just Christmas presents for children. Early next month tens of thousands of enthusiasts will descend on Birmingham NEC for the UK Games Expo, the third-largest hobby and games convention in the world.
